title: Night is too short, can I combine Isha with Maghrib so that I get sleep & don't miss Fajr assim
transcript: I have only one question my question is uh about joining the player what's can someone join if they if they feel they will not be able to play on time over sleeping the Hadith of Abbas may Allah be pleased with him that the prophet once in his lifeat joined and and then joined M and together without traveling or being ill and when he was asked why did he do this he replied so that there would not be any hardship upon his umah Scholars looked into this Hadith and said that whenever there is hardship upon the person real hardship then it is permissible for him to combine between and or and such hardship is when in your country the night is too short so Isa is performed at 11: and fer is performed at 2 a.m. 3 hours is not sufficient to sleep and if you pray on time you're going to miss fer and if you don't sleep the whole night you're going to wish work and school there is great hardship in this case we tell people that if you pray M and combine to it immediately and then go to bed immediately so you can catch four or five hours of sleep that would be permissible due to necessity and huge and great hardship and Allah Asel Knows Best
